title: Lowest PM2.5 Air Pollution Exposure
description: In 2015, only 0.0000000687% of the population in the Maldives was exposed to PM2.5 air pollution levels exceeding the WHO guideline, one of the lowest in the world.

title: High CPIA Human Resources Rating
description: As of 2023, the Maldives received a CPIA building human resources rating of 5, indicating strong performance in this area.

title: Low Teenage Motherhood Rate
description: In 2017, only 1.6% of women aged 15-19 in the Maldives were teenage mothers, one of the lowest rates globally.

title: Negative Net Bilateral Aid from Belgium
description: In 2017, the Maldives had a net bilateral aid flow from Belgium of -$200,000, indicating a net outflow rather than inflow of aid.
